column3: I just walked in the bathroom and saw Kathy naked
Y'know if we ever go to war and you’re captured, you’re in for a big surprise
It just keeps getting worse and worse
I mean it’s bad enough that I’m in love with my roommates girlfriend—which by the way, I think she knows
Because every time we’re in the room together there’s this weird like energy between us
And call me crazy, but I think she likes me too
And now I have seen her naked
I mean at least when I’ve seen her with clothes on, I could imagine her body was like covered in boles or something
But there are no boles, she’s smooth
Could everyone totally see up his robe
All right, so I’ll call you later
So things didn’t work out with Kathy, huh
No, things are fine with Kathy
I’m having a late dinner with her tonight, right after my early dinner with Casey
And the craziest thing is that I just ate a whole pizza by myself
Why are you getting so upset
I mean, having sex with an endless line of beautiful women must be very unfulfilling for you
Look, Joey, Kathy is clearly not fulfilling your emotional needs
But Casey, I mean granted I only saw the back of her head, but I got this sense that she’s-she’s smart, and funny, and gets you
You got all that from the back of her head
All right look, I think it’s time for you to settle down
Make a choice, pick a lane
"Little, tiny Tarzan, swinging on a nose hair
Swinging with the greatest of ease…" Darn it
Now, I don’t know who to get to the next verse
Oh, you could just go uh, "greatest of ease…  BAH-bah-bha-bhannn
Well umm, y’know, I used to play
Oh yeah, that’s right, the keyboards, huh
Yeah, just a little in high school, but then I really got into it in college
I mean that’s-that’s when I really found my sound
Orange juice just came out of my nose, but it was totally worth it
Oh my God, I completely forgot about your sound
He used to lock himself in the basement for hours
No one was every allowed to hear, "The Sound
I mean, nah, I haven’t played in so long, and-and, well it’s-it’s really personal stuff, y’know
Come on, play that funky music white boy
No, you guys, I mean my keyboards are all the way up in—No, yeah, okay
Y’know, I’ve-I’ve never played my stuff for anyone before, so it’s important that-that you understand it’s about communicating very private emotions
Y’know, umm, you should-you should think of umm, my work as wordless sound poems
Boy, that was-that was, umm… terrific
Yeah, I mean, you should play in public
That’s uh—ohhh, I wanna, I wanna play you another piece
I left my uh, helicopter sounds on another disk
This is so nice, I’m—I am so…
Oh God bless my dad sound proofing the basement
Oh, I can’t believe I ever let him touch me with those fingers
What are you guys talking about, I loved it
Oh, plus it’s just, it’s so different from the stuff you usually hear
Yeah, I know what you’re thinkin’
Yes, yes, your breasts are just as firm and juicy
Uh yes, but uh, I just watch it for the articles
No-no, he’s not back yet, but he’ll be here any minute
I uh, don’t really have a preference
I like it in the stern
Listen Casey and I were on our way back and had a little car trouble
We broke down on the Parkway, so I have to walk back and get some transmission fluid
And hey, listen could you please tell Kathy that I’ll be there as soon as I can
‘Cause I only have one quarter, and I think my time is about to—
I thought your time ran out
Me too, but I guess I do have a couple of more—
He’s running a little late, he says he’s sorry
So I guess it’s just uh, you and me then
So what did you do today
Oh, I had an appointment to get my haircut…
Of course, I learned at my aunt’s dog grooming shop, but hey, what do you say
Okay, just don’t make my tail too poofy
Y’know who also has great hair is Joey
Just let me get this off your neck
Checking to see if it’s even
Listen uh, I’m really sorry, it looks like I’m gonna be stuck here for a while
I got the transmission fluid, but when I went to put it in the car, the transmission wasn’t there
Yeah, it must’ve fallen out a few blocks back
I just figured we hit a dog
Listen uh, could you put Kathy on, I wanna apologize
Oh no it’s fine, don’t worry about it
No, I really did forget my purse
Wait the uh, the kiss or the situation
Here’s what we do, we-we forget it happened
Even if it means we’re unhappy forever
I have to; he’s my best friend, and you’re seeing him
Chandler, I like Joey a lot, but with you…
See-see, you’re getting me confused, I’m starting to urn
If you wanna pretend that nothing happened, I can try
Y'know, there’s a Starbucks about three blocks down
Oh no, I’m not playing tonight
It’d be like those bicycle ridding chimps that followed The Beetles
Phoebe, the place has emptied because of him
Oh my God, he’s not even appreciated in his own time
I would give anything to not be appreciated in my own time
I can’t believe I locked myself out again
Well, I just thought it’d make me feel good to do something nice for my friend
A TV as if it appears from nowhere
Man, how did you afford this stuff
I mean who needs a savings account
Oh, you are the best friends anyone has ever had
You do this, you give me the great advice, and hey listen, I was thinking about what you said yesterday about focusing on one woman, I’m gonna do that
No-no-no, I think I’m gonna see how things go with Kathy
I think somebody’s got a little crush on Casey
How ‘bout I fix you two up
That all the pieces of my life are falling right into place
So Monica tells me that uh, you don’t want to play anymore because me and y'know my talent
Yeah, I-I can’t—I mean y’know I was trying to be really y'know okay and upbeat about it, I just—I feel so dwarfed by your musical gift
See but, Pheebs that-that is the exact opposite intent of my music
Y’know my music is-is meant to inspire, and if it bothers you this much, then I… I won’t play anymore
How could I live with myself if I knew I was depriving the world of your music
Joey has the best boyfriend ever
Is there anyway, anyway you think he’ll understand this
You obviously haven’t screwed over a lot of your friends
No the-the sad thing is, if you had told him how you felt before you kissed her, knowing Joey, he probably just would’ve just stepped aside
Then why didn’t you tell me to do that
Well, I said-I said something to Phoebe
And I thought it was a really good idea
Well, Chandler, you’re gonna have to tell him
Why do I have to tell him
Hey, would it be okay if I wrote a song about this
Well, we only had samboucha, so it is now
Listen ah, Joe, I-I need to, I need to talk to you about something
I like her a lot actually
Well, you’re timing couldn’t be better
Yeah, she broke up with me
At first I thought she was doing some kind of scene, that’s why I let people watch
Oh man, I am so sorry
Yes, but I-I uh, don’t have too
No-no-no, no it’s uh, it’s okay
Well, I thought that would be the best thing to do
But hey, listen just so you know, you might have you’re work cut out for you
‘Cause when I talked to her, I kinda got the feeling that she’s into some other guy
See uh, that’s-that’s actually what I wanted to talk to you about
I-I think I know who the other guy is
Yeah, I mean when you were late last night, Kathy and I got to talking, and one thing to another and…
But there’s nothing I can do, I think I’m in love with her
I would never do that to you
You’re right, I have no excuses
I was totally over the line
You-you’re-you’re so far past the line, that you-you can’t even see the line
The line is a dot to you
Is that why you bought all this stuff
Well, y’know what I will not watch your TV, I will not listen to your stereo, and there’s a cinnamon raisin loaf in the new bread maker that I’m not gonna eat
Because it’s all tainted with your betrayal
From now on this apartment is empty for me
And I’m not happy about you either
Oh, and just so you know, I made that bread for you
Oh my God, he’s lost it
Phoebe, his music could not get any worse
There are rats in the basement that are hanging themselves
Y’know, I’m not gonna play anymore,  would you, can you finish my set
No, I mean if I can help
Yeah, like I could lose it
I played bad on purpose guys
Okay, so you were trying to play bad this whole time
